job_tasks.phrase: ontwerpen, implementeren en optimaliseren van generatieve AI-oplossingen
job_tasks.justification: Describes the core activities of building, integrating, and optimizing AI-powered solutions.
Highlights specific expertise in a key Generative AI methodology and system.
Indicates direct work with core Generative AI models, implying development or fine-tuning.

job_tasks.phrase: zorg je voor AI-systemen die snel, nauwkeurig en impactvol zijn
job_tasks.justification: Focuses on the performance, accuracy, and impact of the AI systems being built and integrated.

job_tasks.phrase: Je bent de schakel tussen data en output
job_tasks.justification: Relates to the functional aspect of models processing data to produce output, a core part of model development and application.

job_tasks.phrase: je zorgt ervoor dat onze modellen precies datgene leveren wat onze klanten nodig hebben.
job_tasks.justification: Emphasizes aligning model output with customer requirements, linking technical work to business needs.

profile.rationale: The job description demonstrates a balanced mix of core software engineering tasks (designing, implementing, optimizing AI solutions, ensuring system performance) and specialized generative AI tasks (expertise in LLMs, RAGS). The explicit mention of RAGS and LLMs confirms the focus on Generative AI, fitting the profile of a Core GenAI Engineer.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad is clear about the core responsibilities and specific technologies (RAGS, LLMs, vector databases) involved in Generative AI, allowing for confident profile assignment. However, its brevity leaves some room for interpretation on the exact balance of tasks, preventing a perfect score.
